cards.name: Flask of Unlife
cards.description:
This explosive flask spreads a bone-deep chilling oil that harms the living and restores life to the undead or other creatures with the void healing ability.
The oil deals 1d8 void damage or healing, plus 2 splash damage or healing.

cards.name: Bloodthirst Blade

stats.name: Bloodthirst
stats.text:
Acquired after a successful Strike. If you try to take any action other than to Strike or move toward the target again until it is dead or unconscious,
make a DC 12 Will save:
_Success or critical success_ You lose Bloodthirst.
_Failure_ You action is interrupted, but you lose Bloodthirst.
_Critical failure_ Your action is interrupted.

cards.description: This bloody short sword swims with runes of malice.
